entry.title: Enable Hyper-V Service
entry.content:
Scene

  • After installed Docker Desktop , Cannot enable Hyper-V service.

Solution

  • Check Windows Configuration.
  • win + r , input ‚Äúcmd‚Äù.
  • Execute systeminfo.
  • Must all the Hyper-V Requirements are YES.

  • For me , ‚ÄúVirutalization Enabled In Firmware : NO‚Äù.

  • My PC mainboard is Interl H61 , Click ‚Äúdelete‚Äù button show the Bios.

  • Then, Find and Enabled the Virutalization Configuration.

  • Final, Check the systeminfo , Open the Docker Desktop as well.

Other

  • üëâ Windows 10 Hyper-V System Requirements
entry.summary:
Scene

  • After installed Docker Desktop , Cannot enable Hyper-V service.

entry.title: Selfhost PhotoPrism
entry.content:
Scene

  • Better to manage a large number of pictures with photoprism
  • Demo => demo.photoprism

Solution

  • If host on windows must install docker at frist. üëâ Docker Desktop

  1. Make the docker-compose.yml and Modify configuration.

    • where I sign ‚Äú(^.^)‚Äù,it mean should be change.

  2. Move the ‚Äúdocker-compose.yml‚Äù , where you will install the PhotoPrism.

    • E.g : ‚ÄúC:\PhotoPrism‚Äù(Win) or ‚Äú/app/PhotoPrism‚Äù(Linux)

  3. Then, to the ‚Äúdocker-compose.yml‚Äù directory , execute docker-compose up -d

  4. Final,Open http://localhost:2342/ in a Web browser.

Other

  • üëâ PhotoPrism
  • üëâ PhotoPrism Setup Using Docker Compose
entry.summary:
Scene

  • Better to manage a large number of pictures with photoprism
  • Demo => demo.photoprism

entry.title: Disable Windows Update
entry.content:
Scene

  • Disable Windows Update

Solution

  • win + r , input ‚Äúservices.msc‚Äù
  • win + r , input ‚Äúregedit‚Äù
  • make item ‚ÄúWindowsUpdate‚Äù
  • make item ‚ÄúAU‚Äù
  • make DWORD ‚ÄúAUOptions‚Äù
  • value ‚Äú2‚Äù
entry.summary:
Scene

  • Disable Windows Update

entry.title: Get AZ-900 Certification
entry.content:
Prepare

  • üëâ Exam AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
  • Schedule exam
  • Review examination on the site Or outside materials
    • üëâAZ-900
    • üëâAZ-900.bakLink

If Pass

  • Receive Mail
  • Get the Certification
  • Check on
    • Profile => Certifications üëâ docs.microsoft.com
    • üëâ credly
